title: How to run an AB Test in Javascript
description: To run a simple A/B test on a webpage using JavaScript and the Statsig SDK, focusing on showing text with a blue or red background based on the variant assigned, follow these steps. This guide includes creating a basic "Hello World" web application, integrating Statsig for A/B testing, and using the get method to determine the variant.

frontMatter.title: How to run an AB Test in Javascript
